[[Boomerang CEE+EMEA|Boomerang(Romania)]] | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Romania''' is one of [[Turner Broadcasting System]]'s branches in Europe. It is headquartered in Romania's national capital, [[Bucharest]].[http://www.europe.turnerinfo.com/CN/CEE/pressreleases/index.jsp][http://www.doingbusiness.ro/en/business-news/8055/turner-broadcasting-opens-bucharest-office][http://www.actmedia.eu/top+story/turner+broadcasting+opens+bucharest+office/15870] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.turnermediainnovations.com Turner Media Innovations)] * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.ro Cartoon Network (Romania)] * [http://europe.turnerinfo.com Turner Info Europe] * [http://www.boomerangtv.ro/ Boomerang (Romania)] * [http://www.tcmeurope.com/ro/ TCM Romania] {{TBS}} {{Time Warner}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Romania]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Europe]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System]] [[Category:Companies based in Bucharest]] [[Category:Companies of Romania]] [[Category:Time Warner]] [[Category:Media companies of Romania]]
